snippet: At a time of austerity and fallout from the phone hacking scandal, Britons were expected on Thursday to use mayoral and local council elections as a rebuke of their country’ s coalition government.
lead_paragraph: At a time of austerity and fallout from the phone hacking scandal, Britons were expected on Thursday to use mayoral and local council elections as a rebuke of their country’ s coalition government.

headline.seo: Britons Vote in Bellwether Midterm Ballot
headline.main: Britons Vote in Bellwether Midterm Ballot
headline.print_headline: Britons Vote in Bellwether Midterm Ballot
